alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Galveston, northern Brazoria and southeastern Harris Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 301 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dickinson, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Pasadena, League City, Texas City, southern Friendswood, Alvin, Dickinson, La Marque, Santa Fe, Seabrook, Webster, Hitchcock, Kemah, southeastern Clear Lake, Nassau Bay, Taylor Lake Village, El Lago, Clear Lake Shores, The Johnson Space Center, Bacliff and Kemah Boardwalk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Galveston; Coastal Harris; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris
